reviewText: This is a little slow, but the story is pretty good. The ending is not what one wishes for, but probably more like real life. The cast is great, the costumes great and tells a better story in detail about Jeju Island and the horrible living conditions that existed. It explains more about what merchants lived through to try to survive. When one sees the lovely vacaton spot of Jeju, one doesn't realize how difficult the living was and still is for so many. Entertaining and educational.
